coelem $p |- ( F e. ( Poly ` S ) -> ( ( coeff ` F ) e. ( CC ^m NN0 ) /\ E. n e. NN0 ( ( ( coeff ` F ) " ( ZZ>= ` ( n + 1 ) ) ) = { 0 } /\ F = ( z e. CC |-> sum_ k e. ( 0 ... n ) ( ( ( coeff ` F ) ` k ) x. ( z ^ k ) ) ) ) ) ) $.
